Posts.EditableText:
I'd like to toss in a request for Questnet 3.53 before it gets released, which it just seems like a newer version will be out in the next few months.

I'd really like a way to customize the disconnect messaging script, IE: "USER has left the room. (disconnected)" 

This seems like something that perhaps could be toggled on or off using the Server Options definition block, and perhaps customized in some new block of text or something. Sorry just seems like something that will have to be changed eventually thought I'd suggest/request it for the next build, seems like no big deal to change.
